subjects.name: BOTANY

subjects.name: CHEMISTRY
subjects.description:
‚öóÔ∏è Chemistry ‚Äì Where Atoms Bond Easily, But You Struggle to Connect! üòµ‚Äçüí´

The Periodic Table feels like a giant reunion where elements keep changing properties just to confuse you! Organic Chemistry is a never-ending drama starring Carbon, forming and breaking bonds like a pro! üß™üòÇ And Thermodynamics? It proves energy is always conserved ‚Äì except in your brain before exams! üå°Ô∏èüòÜ

But remember, every reaction needs activation energy ‚Äì so stay charged, stay balanced, and keep going! üî•üöÄ

subjects.name: PHYSICS
subjects.description:
‚ö° Physics ‚Äì Where Numbers Have Feelings, and Your Brain Enters Another Dimension! üòµ‚Äçüí´

One moment, you‚Äôre dropping a ball with Newton, the next, you're lost in Einstein‚Äôs time warp! ‚è≥‚ö° Gravity pulls you down, friction slows you down, and exams? Well, they just break you down! üòÇ Meanwhile, waves behave like particles, and electrons refuse to tell you their exact location! üåäüî¨

But don‚Äôt worry‚ÄîPhysics isn‚Äôt about getting every answer right, it‚Äôs about questioning everything! Stay curious, trust the process, and remember‚Äî even time is relative, but your hard work will always count! üöÄüî•

subjects.name: ZOOLOGY
subjects.description:
ü¶¥ Zoology ‚Äì Where You Study Animals, But Feel Like One During Exams! üòµ‚Äçüí´

Zoology makes you realize that your own body is more complicated than you thought! From neurons firing in your brain (or at least trying to) to your heart pumping faster before exams, everything is a scientific mystery! üß†üíì You‚Äôll learn how frogs can breathe through their skin (and wish you had the same ability during stressful viva sessions)! üê∏üòÇ
Zoology isn‚Äôt just about animals, it‚Äôs about understanding yourself ‚Äì and realizing that even after studying so much, you still can‚Äôt control your own sleep cycle! üòÜüî•

classes.name: Class 11
classes.description:
üöÄ Welcome to Class 11 PCB ‚Äì Where Science Gets Real! üî¨‚ú®

üìñ Physics will break your intuition, Chemistry will test your patience, and Biology will make you question how you're even alive! üòµ‚Äçüí´‚öóÔ∏èüß¨

üí° In Physics, you‚Äôll fight gravity, play with forces, and wonder why things fall but marks don‚Äôt rise! üìâüòÇ
üî• Chemistry will make you a master of reactions (except the ones in your exam hall! üòÜ).
üå± Biology will remind you that even the tiniest cell is working harder than you! ü¶†üí™

üìö This journey won‚Äôt be easy, but remember ‚Äì those who understand science, understand life! So buckle up, future doctors and scientists, because the universe isn‚Äôt going to explain itself! üöÄüåç

classes.name: Class 12
classes.description:
üöÄ Class 12 PCB ‚Äì The Final Lap of School Science! üî¨‚ú®

üìñ Physics will twist your brain, Chemistry will test your balancing skills, and Biology will remind you that you‚Äôre just a bundle of biochemical reactions! üòµ‚Äçüí´‚öóÔ∏èüß¨

üî• It‚Äôs tough, but so are you! Stay focused, stay curious, and make this year count ‚Äì because your dreams won‚Äôt chase themselves! üí™üöÄ
